Detection Tools¶

Module containing various tools, to load/create simulations and to measure tests performances.

author:Jean-Baptiste Courbot - jean-baptiste.courbot@univ-lyon1.fr
date:november 16, 2015
detection_tools.gen_signaux_snr(objet_principal, source_gal, source_halo, bruit_pose, SNR, simu, convolve=0)[source]¶

Generates simulated noisy datacubes containing a “galaxy” and a “halo” according to a SNR range.

Parameters:
  • objet_principal (str) – [‘halo’|’galaxy’] Indicates with respect to what object the SNR is evaluated.
  • source_gal (ndarray) – Noiseless datacube containing only the “galaxy”. Shape: (spatial, spatial, spectral).
  • source_halo (ndarray) – Noiseless datacube containing only the “halo”. Shape: (spatial, spatial, spectral).
  • bruit_pose (ndarray) – Noise, over multiple observations, to be added. Shape: (spatial, spatial, spectral, observation).
  • SNR (float) – Signal-to-Noise Ratio range to use.
  • simu (struct) – Simulation data coming from np.load(...). Could be used to retrieve parameters 2,3,4.
  • convolve (bool) – Indicates if the source data should be convolved or not.
detection_tools.get_simu(fileloc, lambda_max=30)[source]¶

Load a simulation and spectrally truncate it

Parameters:
  • fileloc (str) – Path to file.
  • lambda_max (int) – Maximal wawelenght to cut the datacube.
detection_tools.qualif_test(carte, verite, nb_elt)[source]¶

Performance measure on an unmasked region.

Parameters:
  • carte (ndarray) – Continuous statistic map
  • verite (bool,ndarray) – True map.
  • nb_elt (int) – Number ot thresholding to make.
Returns:

PFA (float) - Estimated probability of false alarm.
Returns:

PDET (float) - Estimated probability of detection.
Returns:

Ksi (float) - Corresponding threshold.
detection_tools.qualif_test_halo(carte, init, verite, nb_elt)[source]¶

Performance measure on a masked region.

Parameters:
  • carte (ndarray) – Continuous statistic map
  • init (ndarray) – Region to ignore in evaluation.
  • verite (bool,ndarray) – True map.
  • nb_elt (int) – Number ot thresholding to make.
Returns:

PFA (float) - Estimated probability of false alarm.
Returns:

PDET (float) - Estimated probability of detection.
Returns:

Ksi (float) - Corresponding threshold.
